title.rendered: Eric Dane and Rebecca Gayheart: Expecting Baby #2!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Eric Dane and Rebecca Gayheart already have a toddler at home in Billie Beatrice, who was born in March 2010. Soon she’ll be a big sister.

The couple is expecting their second child, a source confirmed.

The Grey’s Anatomy actor and Gayheart were married in 2004.

“I don’t know if there’s any change more significant that a human being can make than that of a woman becoming a mother. There’s no change more dramatic,” Dane said of his beautiful wife earlier this spring.

“You know, I’m a hundred times more attracted to her now. I love her exponentially more than I did before. It’s just great to see her be a mother.”

Congratulations to the happy, growing family!
